name: pawhaven
description: A website/portal to get collective information on pet medicine including information about domesticated animals, such as cats.

scripts.start: SET NODE_ENV=production & SET VITE_NODE_ENV=production & concurrently "cd ./server && npm run dev" "cd ./client && npm run dev"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd ./server && npm run dev" "cd ./client && npm run dev"
